info.author: Leandro Melo de Sales (leandroal)
info.description: BRisa is an UPnP framework written in Python. It provides facilities for creating UPnP devices and control points. The Python-BRisa API comprehends internet messaging protocols and basic services (TCP, UDP, HTTP, SOAP, SSDP), networking facilities, threading management, logging, configurations, web server and more. Python-BRisa's runs on the maemo plataform, Linux and on Mac with a few tweaks. We would really appreciate community feedback, bug reports and feature requests concerning attempts to run it on other systems.
info.name: python3-brisa
info.html_description: BRisa is an UPnP framework written in Python. It provides facilities for creating UPnP devices and control points. The Python-BRisa API comprehends internet messaging protocols and basic services (TCP, UDP, HTTP, SOAP, SSDP), networking facilities, threading management, logging, configurations, web server and more. Python-BRisa’s runs on the maemo plataform, Linux and on Mac with a few tweaks. We would really appreciate community feedback, bug reports and feature requests concerning attempts to run it on other systems.
